name: European Factories of the Future Research Association
goal: The European Factories of the Future Research Association (EFFRA) is an industry-driven association promoting the development of new and innovative production technologies. It is the official representative of the private side in the European Union's  'Factories of the Future' public-private partnership.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
FP9
Horizon 2020 (+ related EU research & innovation activities)
Europe 2020
Digital Agenda
Digital Single Market
European Industrial Policy
EIT
